text:
Dreams | Stockholm, Sweden | Full Time Engineer

We’re looking to expand our team of engineers! Come talk to us if you’re into writing code and eager to learn more about working in a polyglot environment; frontend and backend skillsets are welcome!

Remoting is possible, but we’re mainly interested in on-site people. (Because we like “fika” in Sweden)

More details: https://medium.com/@Dreams_app/general-engineering-ad-2017-1...

https://www.getdreams.com/

No recruiters, thanks.
